channel.title: c-sharp on Miro's World
channel.description: Recent content in c-sharp on Miro's World

item.title: Will C# 3.0 become an uglier version of Python ?
item.description: It is now about 1 year since official release of C# 2.0 and .NET framework 2.0. The next version of C# language - the C# 3.0 seems to get more and more attention - in blogs, official channels and MSDN. There is lot of excitement and big expectations - but I have nagging feeling that the general direction of the C# development is not necessary an improvement. The main new features of the C# 3.
